subproject.description: The JSP-DRR is designed to provide a broad framework for disaster risk reduction activities in-line with the Hyogo Framework for Action Priorities for Action and Key Activities .  The JSP will categorize UN System and partner disaster risk reduction activities following the HFA Key Activities, which will allow ease of tracking and harmonization with the convergence group process and the Government Of Indonesia National Action Plan (NAP). This framework will facilitate HFA reporting for Global DRR progress monitoring.
subproject.title: UN Join Strategy Programme
